Reviews.Title: GREAT PICTURE GREAT VALUE
Reviews.Author: Bill
Reviews.Content: I purchased this tv from Walmart for about $59.00 cheaper (plus tax). Picture is awesome. I purchased it for my bedroom. It basically has none of the extra bells and whistles, just 2 HDMI plugs on the back. The sound is also very basic (it sounds kind of like the sound coming out of a good clock radio) but if you want to upgrade the sound, that's what all of the jacks in the back are for.  Like I said, it is just for my bedroom and for that, the sound is fine. If you are just looking for a basic tv for your bedroom with an excellent vibrant picture at a very good price, this is the one for you. We love it!

Reviews.Title: Ashok
Reviews.Author: Ashok "ashok"
Reviews.Content: In the price range it is an excellent TV in all respects.Already we have the same Toshiba TV we have in our home.Only one flaw I found that the option of the "Color sream HD" was missing in this TV !I found out the modelNo.was 40FT2U1 and not 40FT2U.Such trick has been played by the supplier to keep buyer ignorant of that fact.Perhapes Amazon themselves may not be knowing and they must know this.However for my purposwe the TV and its low price were good enough.Toshiba 40FT2U 40-Inch 1080p LCD HDTV

Reviews.Title: mainboard failed after 2 weeks of use Toshiba 40FT2U HDTV
Reviews.Author: Don
Reviews.Content: 40FT2U product looked nice in the box and had a nice picture for a short time. The display control board failed after two weeks. It is well known to customer support agents and 3rd party repair that these Toshiba HDTVs have a defective display board with an extremely high failure rate. Customer support is in the Philipines and transfers case to third party repair and will not help in any other way. Repair can't be made without part whose arrival moves out 2-4 weeks with every call. Headed to 60 days now with no part or repair. This long back order for this Toshiba HDTV component speaks for itself--high demand or they don't know to make a good one.

Reviews.Title: Do Not Buy This TV
Reviews.Author: Elizabeth Waddell
Reviews.Content: I purchased this TV on Jan 27 and less than 70 days later the mainboard had failed.  It has been over 2 weeks since I contacted Toshiba and the part is still on back order with no eta of when it will be available.  What's more, Toshiba's customer service is horrible - they told me that they won't even address "other options" until the part has been backordered for 20 BUSINESS days (meaning closer to a month).  When I asked to be escalated, the support rep named Chris told me that he "had addressed" my question and hung up on me.I know this is a lower end TV, but I'm just starting out and this was a big purchase for me.  I can assure you I'll steer clear of all Toshiba products going forward.

Reviews.Title: THIS PRODUCT JUNK AND THE WORST CUSTOMER SERVICE EXPERIENCE EVER!
Reviews.Author: Sckrippie3
Reviews.Content: JUNK, JUNK, JUNK!  LIKE THE MAJORITY OF THE REVIEWS YOU WILL FIND ON THIS PRODUCT!  T.V. PICTURE WENT OUT WITHIN TWO MONTHS OF PURCHASE DUE TO KNOWN DEFECT OF THE MAIN BOARD AND CUSTOMER SERVICE HORRID!  WILL NEVER BUY ANOTHER TOSHIBA PRODUCT AGAIN, EVER!

Reviews.Title: DO NOT BUY THIS TV!!!
Reviews.Author: Rich
Reviews.Content: Since the day I bought this TV from Best Buy it has been shutting itself off for no reason. The TV then has to be unplugged from the wall outlet for a while before it can be turned back on. TV stays on for about five minutes before shutting itself off again. The TV has a great looking picture (for about 5 minutes) but other than that it is a piece of junk. Don't walk away, RUN away from this TV!!

Reviews.Title: very bad
Reviews.Author: Anu
Reviews.Content: please don't buy Toshiba. they don't value their customers. I bought a Toshiba on feb20th  and it is not working from april 10th. I called toshiba then they told that a technician will come. till may 10th nobody came. then we called toshiba again asked to replace TV. they offered refurbished one instead of new one, or refund without taxes. till now they didn't resolved the issues. they don't answer our questions properly. totally very very bad customer service. never go for toshiba. you will be in trouble

Reviews.Title: worked fine for almost 2 years, but suddenly quit.
Reviews.Author: H. Eck "h_eck"
Reviews.Content: Now it won't power on.  Toshiba help line says it is out of warranty.  I won't be buying another Toshiba TV.

Reviews.Title: Very happy
Reviews.Author: Ronald J. West "Captain Ron"
Reviews.Content: I had purchased my Toshiba at Best buy back in Feb '12 and absolutely love it. Toshiba is a respected brand name and I've owned various Toshiba products in the past. They were on sale at the time and my Best buy store was sold out. Mine was fresh from the box and put out on the display floor the same day I bought it.I have had no problems with it although I did purchase the extended warranty just in case. Only thing about it is I wished the sound came out louder but a set of surround sound speakers can help with that.

Reviews.Title: It's a Lemon!
Reviews.Author: LizzieJ
Reviews.Content: DO NOT BUY THIS TELEVISION!!!!!!!My husband purchased this t.v. in December of 2011.  It worked fine - nothing exceptional, not a great picture, not great sound.  Then, suddenly, about one month ago, it wouldn't turn on!  After reading all sorts of forums and trying a variety of things, it still wouldn't turn on.  One day, after not even trying to turn it on for a week, I decided to hold down the "on" button for an extended time and it worked!  Magic!  Two weeks later - it won't turn on and this time it doesn't matter what we do.  I have found a number of forums in which people who purchased this same model at the exact same time we did are having the exact same problem - with no support from Toshiba.We will definitely NEVER buy a Toshiba television again, and will think (at least) twice about purchasing any other products made by Toshiba.

Reviews.Title: LEMON
Reviews.Author: Julie A. Koski
Reviews.Content: I should have read the reviews before I bought this from Tiger Direct.  After only a month the TV fails to turn on.  There are known issues with the electronics of it and Toshiba tech support is a voice mail maze designed to make the customer give up rather than to help fix the problem.  Replacement parts are difficult for the 3rd party repair people to get.  Do not buy this model of TV or for that matter, anything with the Toshiba brand.

Reviews.Title: Horrible-run do not buy this TV
Reviews.Author: Lilly
Reviews.Content: Really needed a new TV and purchased from Best Buy 40FT2U.  The power board failed after two months. It is well known to customer support agents but they dont tell you that on the phone.  They give you a ref# and tell you it will be about a week.  After a week I called to follow up on part and they referred me to the 3rd party repair company nexcor whom advised me that these Toshiba HDTVs have a defective power board with an extremely high failure rate.  They said that after getting many power boards in they realized that this is not the problem because the power boards are not working and that its actually the main board.  Which now due to the long back order for this Toshiba HDTV component speaks for itself--high demand or they don't know to make a good one.  They give you another reference number and tell you that this is all they can do for you.  THEY DO NOT CARE!  Please do not buy anything from Toshiba,  I promise you they have the worst customer service I have ever experienced. I spoke to Julie in customer relations, she will not transfer you to a manager, she will not give you an employee id or last name or any other way to file a complaints.....  I am stuck with this TV :-(  without sound or picture yet I have only made 3 credit card payments.

Reviews.Title: HDMI sound of silence mac HDMI
Reviews.Author: Patrick Donnelly
Reviews.Content: Just FYI, I'm not having much luck with getting sound with picture via HDMI from  MacBook Pro. It seems the software in this set is rudimentary. Have tried several HDMI adapters and cables, that all work on other sets. Just not this one. Does work as expected with disk players.Not finding any firmware updates yet either.Also note that toshiba remote codes are so obscure that your typical universal or disc remote with universal tv support won't work.No audio outs either.Otherwise if you are just going to hang it on the wall and not try any creative connections or uses it makes a decent picture and didn't cost much.
